properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 3:05AM PST until February 3 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph
with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Hard Freeze Watch late tonight
through Tuesday morning, sub- freezing temperatures from the
mid teens to low 20s possible.

* WHERE...Northwest Deserts.

* WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM MST this evening. For
the Hard Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Tuesday
morning.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
Temperatures well below freezing conditions could kill crops,
other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected
outdoor plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED
